org.opends.sdk
Interface AddRequest

All Superinterfaces:
AttributeSequence, Request
public interface AddRequest
extends Request, AttributeSequence

The Add operation allows a client to request the addition of an entry into the Directory.

The RDN attribute(s) may or may not be included in the Add request. NO-USER-MODIFICATION attributes such as the createTimestamp or creatorsName attributes must not be included, since the server maintains these automatically.

addAttribute

AddRequest addAttribute(String attributeDescription,
                        Object value)
                        throws UnsupportedOperationException,
                               NullPointerException
Ensures that the entry to be added by this add request contains the provided attribute value. Any existing values for the attribute will be retained.

If the attribute value is not an instance of ByteString then it will be converted using the ByteString.valueOf(Object) method.

Parameters:
attributeDescription - The name of the attribute to be added.
value - The value of the attribute to be added.
Returns:
This add request.
Throws:
UnsupportedOperationException - If this add request does not permit attributes to be added.
NullPointerException - If attributeDescription or value was null.

addAttribute

AddRequest addAttribute(String attributeDescription,
                        Collection<?> values)
                        throws UnsupportedOperationException,
                               IllegalArgumentException,
                               NullPointerException
Ensures that the entry to be added by this add request contains the provided attribute values. Any existing values for the attribute will be retained.

Any attribute values which are not instances of ByteString will be converted using the ByteString.valueOf(Object) method.

Parameters:
attributeDescription - The name of the attribute to be added.
values - The values of the attribute to be added, which must not be empty.
Returns:
This add request.
Throws:
UnsupportedOperationException - If this add request does not permit attributes to be added.
IllegalArgumentException - If values was empty.
NullPointerException - If attributeDescription or values was null.

addAttribute

AddRequest addAttribute(String attributeDescription,
                        Object firstValue,
                        Object... remainingValues)
                        throws UnsupportedOperationException,
                               NullPointerException
Ensures that the entry to be added by this add request contains the provided attribute values. Any existing values for the attribute will be retained.

Any attribute values which are not instances of ByteString will be converted using the ByteString.valueOf(Object) method.

Parameters:
attributeDescription - The name of the attribute to be added.
firstValue - The first value of the attribute to be added.
remainingValues - The remaining values of the attribute to be added.
Returns:
This add request.
Throws:
UnsupportedOperationException - If this add request does not permit attributes to be added.
NullPointerException - If attributeDescription or firstValue was null, or if remainingValues contains a null element.

getName

String getName()
Returns the distinguished name of the entry to be added by this add request. The server shall not dereference any aliases in locating the entry to be added.
